txt.en:
'Know you aught of the lore of Angmar?

'Well, no matter. You will learn... if Nethraw will have anything to say about it. He is in a lonely vale, the Krúsle Lannan, far to the east of here, musing on the Seven Sentinels.

'I have no doubt he could use your assistance.'

'Well met, stranger! I have tarried here long, seeking to unravel a mystery from times past. Perhaps you can help me? Banfuir at least believes you to have some skill, else he would not have sent you.

'Look upon the seven statues behind me; doubtless you note that they each are missing the sword which they once held. This place is one of ancient evil, something that I have long studied, and I know too well the scars that have been left in its wake.

'This loathsome place may be where the doom of the northern kingdoms was wrought, but I will speak no more of it until I have recovered all seven of the swords.'
There are many old tales long forgotten in Angmar, but Nethraw is interested in only one.
The lore-master Nethraw can be found at the Krúsle Lannan, a considerable distance to the east of Gabilshathûr.\n\nBanfuir suggested you speak with the lore-master Nethraw.
